title: What platforms are supported by Unity?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I would like to know which platforms I can build to with Unity

sections.title: Cause
content: With the release of Unity 5, the list of platforms supported has expanded to include more options for our developers.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can view all platforms that the Unity Engine allows you to deploy to here: Supported Platforms

sections.title: More Information
content: If you wish to build to Flash in Unity, please see the article here
